name: Hamza Sourani
aboutMe: With over 2 years of experience and 4 years in the field, specializing in developing responsive and user-friendly UIs using React.js and Next.js, I am proficient in TypeScript and JavaScript. I aim to become proficient in Node.js and Express.js as well. I am adept at problem-solving, delivering high-quality code, and creating seamless web experiences. I am also passionate about building innovative solutions and consistently contributing to impactful projects while continuously expanding my skills in front-end development.
